attributes.action: handles child maintenence through the inland revenue like tax and national insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to ask the prime minister to take child maintenence like the do income tax and national insurance as a percentage direct from the wage of every non residents wages therfor removing reassements as ech month would be calculated on what the nrp has earned on any given month therfor eliminating any of the problems of reassessment and also these payments to go straight to parent with care via bacs immediately, as the csa lose many payments and hold many payments for lenthy times due to system failures.also the absent parent will be getting a fair assessment every month based on wages that month not on previous wages. therfor a fairere system for all!
